alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Neshoba; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 1:39PM CDT until March 22 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Southern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 139 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Singleton to near Ludlow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Singleton and Renfroe around 145 PM CDT. Madden around 215 PM CDT. Dowdville around 220 PM CDT. Stallo around 225 PM CDT. Dixon around 230 PM CDT. Neshoba around 240 PM CDT. Bethsaida around 250 PM CDT. House around 255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Noxapater, Lena, Tucker, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
